translation: The word "Sat" is used to refer to reality and goodness; likewise, O Arjuna, the word "Sat" is used to refer to an auspicious act.
commentary: 17.26 in the sense of reality? Sadhubhave in the sense of goodness? f and? Sat Sat? It is thus? This this? is used is used? Praiseworthy auspicious? Karmani (in the sense of) an act? And so also? Sat Sat? Word: word? Partha O Partha? yujyate is used.Commentary Satbhava That which is unchanging amidst the changing? that which is permanent amidst the impermanent? that which exists in the past? present
